attributes.action: Call for a review on what countries receive UK aid money
attributes.additional_details:
It is well known now that some countries receive an awful lot of UK aid money that then goes on non-aid related projects.

This is OUR money that is being mis-spent and I would like to see British people receiving the money that would be wasted overseas.

Of course let us give clothing, medicines and food- where necessary. But just not money that is so easily diverted from where it is most needed.

rejection.details: This petition has been closed at request of the petitioner.
